caption.body: NOW PLAYING: Filmmaker Paloma Martinez sensitively captures a bittersweet moment in the life of wide-eyed, eight-year-old Geovany Cesario, who documents his final day in the Crisanto Street neighborhood that is home to many who work in the shadows of Silicon Valley.  See "Crisanto Street" by Paloma Martinez, now playing in the Video Arts Room located pre-security in the International Terminal. http://bit.ly/2JIRfJV
